mapper.select: SELECT B.id,B.customerId,H.* FROM bucket as B INNER JOIN hotel as H ON B.hotelId = H.id

SELECT B.id,B.customerId,B.payment,H.id as hotelId,H.name as hotelName,H.startEntry, H.endEntry,H.price,H.booked FROM bucket as B INNER JOIN hotel as H ON H.id=B.hotelId where B.customerId = #{id} and B.payment = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bucket(customerId, hotelId, hotelName, price) VALUES(#{customerId}, #{hotelId}, #{hotelName}, #{price})
